SystemFonts Class

Definition

Contains properties that expose the system resources that concern fonts.

In this Article

public static class SystemFonts

CaptionFontFamily

Gets the metric that determines the font family of the caption of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.

public static System.Windows.Media.FontFamily CaptionFontFamily { get; }
Value
FontFamily

A font family.

Remarks

Obtain the metric from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS. See SystemParametersInfo.

XAML Attribute Usage

<object property="{ SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily}"/>
